programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: A biological experiment goes haywire when meat-eating mutant roaches invade an island community.

programme.title: Day of the Dead 2: Contagium
programme.desc: In 1968, in the Ravenside Military Hospital in a military facility in Pennsylvania, the army loses control of an experiment of a lethal bacteriologic weapon that changes the DNA and transforms human beings into zombies.

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: Christie's nightmares grow worse after her father drowns, revealing a sinister truth tied to the mortuary.

programme.title: The Convent
programme.desc: A group of college students breaks into an abandoned convent, only to discover that it's inhabited by demons.

programme.title: Stepfather III
programme.desc: A suspicious youth utilises his computer skills to learn the true identity of the menacing figure romancing his mother.

programme.title: Horror Bites
programme.desc: Small tales, big terror... In this Horror Bites marathon, bite-sized stories deliver spine-chilling scares in under 20 minutes. From twisted encounters to nightmarish twists, these short horrors pack a punch, proving that sometimes the scariest tales come in small doses.

programme.title: Eat Brains Love
programme.desc: When Jake and his dream girl, Amanda, contract a mysterious zombie virus, they end up on the run from Cass, a teen psychic sent by the government's top-secret Necrotic Control Division to track them down as they search for a cure.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Doomsday Machine
programme.desc: When a Chinese plot to destroy the Earth is uncovered, the U.S. teams up with the Soviet Union to replace members of its all-male crew with women.

programme.title: Creepshow 3
programme.desc: This second sequel to Creepshow features five new tales of horror.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: Amityville: Dollhouse
programme.desc: A girl unwittingly releases evil spirits lurking within her toy house, which wreak havoc upon her family.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: Trish's slumber party for her basketball teammates includes an unexpected guest.

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A babysitter is terrorized by the child's father who's recently escaped from a nearby psychiatric institution.
